attributes.additional_details:
Anyone charged during the riots and looting should be sent to prison for a length of time,have benefit payments stopped,made to walk through the streets
where they live so people know what kind of low life they are,made to do unpaid work to give something
back to the community they took from and made to go face to face with the people who had their shops,
homes and theirs lives ruined by these SO CALLED
HUMAN BEINGS and say sorry to them.
